ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.modes

Class FlightMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.modes.FlightMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFlightMode

    public class FlightMode
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFlightMode
    Generic Flight Mode implementation which can be configured e.g. with Spring. We manage the devices and Rules which are relevant for this Mode: Stabilized mode e.g. needs an IMU device
    Author:
    pschatzmann
